cont.entity_a: Setup is straightforward, but lacks static DHCP support.
cont.entity_b: Router is easy to manage with an app, but requires frequent resets.

cont.entity_a: Frequent reboots are required due to DHCP server issues.
cont.entity_b: Frequent reboots are required to maintain 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz functionality.

cont.entity_a: Range is significantly less than the advertised 300 feet, with poor signal quality beyond 80 feet.
cont.entity_b: Router's range is limited, and setup can be challenging.

cont.entity_a: Documentation is incomplete and only covers Win 98 & ME, lacking support for NT or 2000.
Customer support was generally unhelpful, with limited support for Mac users.
cont.entity_b: Customer service is responsive but unable to provide permanent fixes.

Firmware.comm: Firmware updates are crucial for maintaining connection stability.

cont.entity_a: Firmware updates are necessary for full functionality and improved performance.
cont.entity_b: Firmware issues lead to frequent Wi-Fi drops and reboots.

cont.entity_a: The product does not support more than one Xbox connected to Xbox Live simultaneously.
cont.entity_b: Router is not recommended for high-demand gaming setups.

cont.entity_a: Installation software simplifies the setup process, resulting in quick installation.
Wireless signal strength is generally good, but range decreases significantly with distance.
cont.entity_b: Provides excellent Wi-Fi coverage in large houses, especially with extenders.

cont.entity_a: The product is not suitable for advanced users requiring extensive configuration options.
cont.entity_b: Router is versatile and reliable with DD-WRT firmware for network security.

cont.entity_a: The router frequently loses connectivity and requires resets.
cont.entity_b: Router's 5 GHz band periodically turns off.

cont.entity_a: Product quality is inconsistent, with many users experiencing hardware failures.
cont.entity_b: Router overheats due to the removal of the cooling fan.
Security issues lead to unauthorized WAN traffic.
Open-source firmware provides extensive customization options.
